text: Egh ia plauan nar aghuim inigh, an osɨmtɨzim 2 kilogrem, egh olivɨn borem ko a veregh witɨn ofa tu. Ia ofan isia bar mɨghɨrim sara an ofa damu, eghtɨ kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ ofan tuamin kamɨn mughuriar aghuim baregh, egh a gifuegh navir aghuim an ikiam. Egh uaghan, ia 1 lita wainɨn dɨpam inigh ofan kamning sara ofa damu.
